title: Are people who have passed and are in heaven now able to hear me when I talk to them? - Quora

response.answer_text: I would say yes. Many times I have asked for them and most often they come to me in a dream state. I would question that but most are not the same age as I knew them and often I do not recognize them until the moment the dream ends. It is as if they are saying you can only go this far. In my youth I struggled with sleep paralysis and could often see what was around me as I slept. After years of learning how to counteract it, I began to go out of my body. But the connection was always in a dream state that they control. Be aware of your dreams practice remembering them when you awake. In my belief the dream state is the heaven we seek, ironic if we have been seeing it all along. I think dream is the easiest way for them to make contact. So ask and be aware and you may get a response. It may be just me ,I don't know, but every encounter no one has talked, it was more of a telepathy and they show you things. My grandfather once showed me a bees nest. I struggled for fifteen years to figure out why. Then on the first day I moved into his old home. The neighbor knocked on the door. He asked if he could take care of a bees nest on the side of the house since he was taking care of one on his. I said ok, sure. It dawned on me then what my grandfather had showed me. He was aware 15 years before. To me it was like a holy shit moment, that's when I began to really think it was all real.

Most people who have passed away are conscience of nothing. They are in the grave and await a resurrection to life in the future, they are not in heaven. Ecclesiastes 9:5 NW — For the living are conscious that they will die; but as for the dead, they are conscious of nothing at all, neither do they anymore have wages, because the remembrance of them has been forgotten. However, there are some anointed Christians who have been resurrected to life in heaven since Christ’s kingship was established in 1914. Whether they can hear us or not is irrelevant, because they do not answer prayers, only God answers prayers, offered to him in the name of his beloved son Christ Jesus. Psalms 65:2 NW — O Hearer of prayer, to you people of all sorts will come. John 16:23 NW — In that day you will ask me no question at all. Most truly I say to you, if you ask the Father for anything, he will give it to you in my name.

I am an atheist but it would be churlish of me to pull down your pack of cards You are obviously a simple soul with basic beliefs. Yes, of course they can hear you, and I’m sure they are looking after your interests. However, I expect they listen in all the time, so don’t do or say anything naughty.

It depends solely on you and what you believe, people will try to force their beliefs on you or belittle yours thinking that they know better or that their way is the right way. The truth is, nobody knows for sure but if talking to them and expressing how much you miss them and care about them makes you feel a little bit better, then by all means do it and do it as many times as you need to. I hope this helps
